task.title: Starting a meeting with a chat partner
task.shortdesc: The call feature available with a chat partner also allows you to initiate a meeting with your chat partner or a group.

context.p: From the menu option, you can see meetings that you are the owner and a member. You can only start meetings for those that you are the owner.

step.cmd: Click the meeting icon ( ) in the chat message field.
From the list of meetings, select the meeting that to use.
step.info: A Meet me here: with the meeting link displays in the chat input field.
Your chat partners receive the meeting message and can click the link to join the meeting.
